name: Shelgon

evolution.description: Shelgon can evolve into Salamence at level 16 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 12 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Endurance Pokémon. Covering Shelgon's body are outgrowths much like bones. The shell is very hard and bounces off enemy attacks. When awaiting evolution, this Pokémon hides away in a cavern.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no recoil damage.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather-related moves and phenomena like Hail, Weather Ball, etc.
